entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
